scripts.postinstall: cd packages/db && bunx prisma generate && cd ../..
scripts.env:dev: bun -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');fs.copyFileSync(path.join('apps','web','.env.example'),path.join('apps','web','.env'));fs.copyFileSync(path.join('apps','auth','.env.example'),path.join('apps','auth','.env'));console.log('✅ Environment files copied successfully');"
scripts.clean: bun -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function rm(dir) { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { console.log('Deleting ' + dir); fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } } function findAndDelete(folder) { const walk = (dir) => { const files = fs.readdirSync(dir); files.forEach(file => { const fullPath = path.join(dir, file); if (fs.statSync(fullPath).isDirectory()) { if (file === folder) { rm(fullPath); } else { walk(fullPath); } } }); }; walk(process.cwd()); } ['node_modules', '.next', '.turbo'].forEach(findAndDelete); console.log('✅ Cleanup completed');"
scripts.db:up: cd packages/db && bunx prisma generate && bunx prisma db push
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --profile init --profile studio up -d
scripts.docker:apps: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --profile apps up web auth -d --build
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker volume rm zephyr-dev-postgres-data zephyr-dev-redis-data zephyr-dev-minio-data zephyr-dev-redisinsight-data && rm -f .dev-init
scripts.docker:build:all: docker buildx bake --file docker-bake.hcl auth-local web-local
